src:
Pemain Arsenal Tak Sungkan Mengolok Unai Emery di Sesi Latihan, Wibawanya Sudah Jatuh?
02 Nov 2019, 09:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sejumlah pemain Arsenal dikabarkan sudah tak sungkan lagi untuk mengolok bos mereka sendiri, Unai Emery dalam sesi latihan.
Sejak ditunjuk menjadi manajer Arsenal menggantikan Arsene Wenger pada musim panas 2018 lalu, Emery hingga kini masih berproses belajar bahasa Inggris.
Meski bahasa Inggris Emery kini sudah cukup lancar dibanding ketika pertama kali tiba di Inggris, akan tetapi aksen Spanyol bawaan aslinya masih terasa sangat kuat.
text:
Arsenal players do not hesitate to mock Unai Emery in training session, the authority has fallen?
02 Nov 2019, 09:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A number of Arsenal players are rumored to have no longer hesitate to make fun of their own boss, Unai Emery in a training session.
Since being appointed manager of Arsenal to replace Arsene Wenger in the summer of 2018, Emery is still in the process of learning English.
Although Emery's English is now quite fluent compared to when it first arrived in England, the original Spanish accent still feels very strong.
